comments.author: tomas.k
comments.message:
Hi. You could do even better with WebSharper ;) I recommend it from my own experience - it is pure F# - no need to know ASP.NET Web API, REST...
Cheers,
Tomas

replies.author: lucabol
replies.message: I'm sure it is lovely. I am a bit scared by the amount of magic involved, but I'm sure I'll get over it.
